Object.Field: Mittente da cui inviare le mail
aspmx.l.google.com can send mail without authentication to Gmail Addresses

<@
   import java.util.*;
   import java.text.*;
   import com.google.common.io.Files;

	File inProcessDir = new File("#PRJ_UTILITY.FILE_PATH");
	File[] fileList = inProcessDir.listFiles();
	
	if(fileList.length>0) {
	  Date now = new Date();
	  SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy_MM_dd");
	  String folderName = dateFormat.format(now);
	  File dir = new File("#PRJ_UTILITY.FILE_PATH" + "\" + folderName);
			
	  if(!dir.exists())
		dir.mkdir();
			  
	  for (File file : fileList) {
            if(!file.isDirectory()) {
              String fileCurrentNameWithExtension = file.getName();

              String fileCurrentExtensionName = fileCurrentNameWithExtension.substring (fileCurrentNameWithExtension.lastIndexOf('.'),fileCurrentNameWithExtension.length());
              
              if(fileCurrentExtensionName.toLowerCase().endsWith("csv"))
              {
                File destFile = new File("#PRJ_UTILITY.FILE_PATH" + "\" + folderName + "\" + fileCurrentNameWithExtension);
                Files.copy(file, destFile);
              }
              
              String fileCurrentName = fileCurrentNameWithExtension.substring(0,fileCurrentNameWithExtension.lastIndexOf('.'));
              int indexOfDoubleUnderscore = fileCurrentName.lastIndexOf("__");
              
              if(indexOfDoubleUnderscore>0) {
                fileCurrentName = fileCurrentName.substring(0,fileCurrentName.lastIndexOf("__"));
                
                String renamedFile = fileCurrentName + fileCurrentExtensionName;
            
                destFile = new File("#PRJ_UTILITY.FILE_PATH" + "\" + renamedFile);
                Files.move(file, destFile);
              }
            }
          }
        }  
@>
select count(*) from SEMAFORI_IMPORTAZIONE where FlagStatus >0

OdiSendMail "-MAILHOST=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailHost" "-PORT=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailPort" "-PROTOCOL=smtp" "-AUTH=YES" "-AUTHMECHANISMS=LOGIN" "-USER=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailUser" "-FROM=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailFrom" "-SUBJECT=KERING SL - ETL WSE - Backup file fallito" "-TO=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_Admin_MailList" "-ATTACH" Folder backup failed on #PRJ_UTILITY.FILE_PATH. Please check the disk.

OdiSendMail "-MAILHOST=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailHost" "-PORT=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailPort" "-PROTOCOL=smtp" "-AUTH=YES" "-AUTHMECHANISMS=LOGIN" "-USER=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailUser" "-FROM=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailFrom" "-SUBJECT=KERING SL - ETL WSE - Check Failed on import file from Stealth" "-TO=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_Admin_MailList" "-ATTACH=E:\sedApta\Shared\Script\ErrorCheckFile.txt" Check failed on folder #PRJ_UTILITY.FILE_PATH. Please check the attachement for more info.

OdiSendMail "-MAILHOST=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailHost" "-PORT=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailPort" "-PROTOCOL=smtp" "-AUTH=YES" "-AUTHMECHANISMS=LOGIN" "-USER=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailUser" "-FROM=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailFrom" "-SUBJECT=KERING SL - ETL WSE - Check Failed on request.rls" "-TO=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_Admin_MailList"
